title: The remainder, or second part of a Gospel plea (interwoven with a rational and legal) for the lawfulness & continuance of the antient setled maintenance and tithes of the ministers of the Gospel wherein the divine right of our ministers tithes is further asserted ... / by William Prynne of Swainswick, Esq. ...
author: Prynne, William, 1600-1669.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by T. Childe and L. Parry for Edward Thomas ...,
